header: Dorian damages homes and overturns cars in the Bahamas
content: Life-threatening Hurricane Dorian has reached the Bahamas. It is reported to have made landfall in Elbow Cay at 12:40. 14 shelters have been opened all over the Bahamas.

Georgia and South Carolina have announced evacuations in coastal areas. North Carolina has declared the state of emergency. Category 5 Dorian, which winds are 185 mph, is the second-strongest storm in the Atlantic Ocean since 1950.
